column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The service was wonderful here; she was very helpful and was attentive.  The mango sangria is soo delicious too and complimented the dinner very well!  We also ordered some scallops
column3: and it was everything I've been craving for.  The rice was cooked great
column4: and the portion was perfect for two people.  The different tapas was yummy!!  My favorite were the spicy potatoes with tomato aioli!  I would definitely go back just for that!  The shrimp with garlic
column6: and pepper flakes was also pretty amazing.
